title: Pixel 2XL stuck with battery warning, even at 99%
content:
Just downloaded the OTA update for Android 9 this morning on my 2XL (Verizon), and when the phone restarted in immediately gave me the "do-do-do" alert for low battery. I check notifications and it says "Battery may run out soon. Phone may shutdown soon (99%).  (Attached is a screenshot)

Clearing the notification only has it make the sound and come back when it ticks down another percentage. It's stuck there, and I don't see a setting that might be able to turn this off.  Any ideas?

Thanks,
Erik Coleman
University of Illinois
